cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 2.8)
set (PROJ_NAME "SDL2")
project (${PROJ_NAME})

if (IOS)
	include_ios_framework(SDL2 "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}")
	export_ios_framework(${PROJ_NAME} SDL2 "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}")
elseif (OSX)
    include_ios_framework(SDL2 "/Library/Frameworks")
    export_ios_framework(${PROJ_NAME} SDL2 "/Library/Frameworks")
elseif (WIN32)
	string (FIND "${CMAKE_GENERATOR}" "Win64" RESULT)
	if (RESULT)
		export_library(${PROJ_NAME} "/x64")
		copy_runtime_files ("/lib-runtime/win32/x64")
	else ()
		export_library(${PROJ_NAME} "/x86")
		copy_runtime_files ("/lib-runtime/win32/x86")
	endif ()
endif ()
